short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute the ads and set volume on twitch miniplayer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of missing the best of your streamer because of ads? With this extension we help you stay immersed in the stream even when these annoying ads appear.
